parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Takata Airbag Recall Issues with Dodge Sprinter
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to repair the Takata airbag recall can lead to serious injury or death in the event of an accident, as the airbags may not deploy properly or may rupture, causing shrapnel to be ejected into the passenger compartment.
symptoms: as the issue is related to a safety recall and not a specific symptom or malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the turbo resonator can cause an immediate loss of power, leading to a rapid deceleration, which can result in accidents or near-misses, especially when passing or going uphill.
symptoms: especially when passing or going uphill.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Clutch Hydraulic System Failure (Swirl Valve Failure)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch hydraulic system can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Roof Top Air Conditioner Unit Leaks
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The leak in the roof top air conditioner unit can cause water to enter the vehicle, which can lead to electrical issues, corrosion, and safety hazards.
symptoms: Water leaks into the vehicle from the roof top air conditioner unit

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system failures can cause a range of issues, including loss of power, short circuits, and even fires, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
Wiring harness failures can cause electrical systems to short out, leading to loss of power, fires, and accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Battery Isolating Switch (Disconnect Switch) Design Flaw
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaw in the battery isolating switch can cause excessive voltage, leading to destruction of the chassis battery, wiring, and potential damage to the ECM system, which can result in accidents or fires.
symptoms: and potential damage to the ECM system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Clutch and transmission issues can cause loss of power, difficulty shifting gears, and accidents.
